text: ninnalkku kanan kaliyunna tunukaleannumillate avan akasannale srsticcu. bhumiyil unniyuracca parvatannaluntakki. bhumi ninnaleyunkeant ulannupeakatirikkan. atilavan sakalayinam jivajalannaleyum vyapippiccu. manattuninnu mala viltti. atuvali bhumiyil nam sakalayinam mikacca sasyannaleyum mulappiccu
